After digging a glowing spot, plant bells in the hole, and a money tree will grow to triple the bells you planted (10,000 bells recommended!)
[Caution]\nPlanting 1 to 10,000 bells will always triple your money, but planting more gives you a 20% chance to triple and an 80% chance to get 30,000 bells.
